......The suspenseful development continues to grip my
hands. I have been following this series for a
long time, so I have been eagerly waiting and
looking forward to today... And yet!

......It seems that she was bored. It's a pity that she
can't understand the greatness of this series...
Well, I can at least appreciate her desperate
effort to watch it...

\n<Sonoda>(Did I make a mistake in choosing the movie... Should
I have picked the new Ghibli film that Akane
seemed interested in...)

Next to me, Akane desperately fighting against
drowsiness was so funny that I couldn't
concentrate on the movie in the end... I'll keep
it a secret from her.

\n<Akane Minato>I'm sorry... I completely fell asleep halfway
through...

\n<Sonoda>No, it's fine. It's just... our plan to discuss the
movie with Akane over a meal afterwards got
canceled.
\n<Akane Minato>Ugh... I'm really sorry...

\n<Sonoda>No, it's fine. It's just... I was shocked to see her
looking bored because it's a series that I love.
It's just a story of critical damage to my
delicate heart.
\n<Akane Minato>Geez... you always tease me like that...

Ah, that cute reaction of yours when you pout like
that makes me want to tease you.

\n<Akane Minato>Sigh... Then as an apology, I'll make Kohei-san's
favorite dish next week.

\n<Sonoda>Seriously?! Consommé jelly of Brittany lobster with caviar
and smooth cauliflower mousse?!
\n<Akane Minato>I'm sorry... It's just a plain cheeseburger...

After that summer training camp, AlterGuns disbanded,
leaving everyone feeling regretful. At that time,
I suffered from severe depression due to a deep
sense of loss and was forced to be hospitalized.
However, thanks to her devoted care, I was able to
regain my current life.

And shortly after being discharged from the hospital,
I started dating Sawa, also known as Akane
Sawamura....
\n<Sonoda>What about Momo?

Akane, with a troubled expression, puts her smartphone
into her bag and turns towards me.

\n<Akane Minato>Most of it is just complaints... She was sighing and
saying that office work makes her sleepy~

\n<Sonoda>Seriously, that Momo... I hope she's not relieving stress
with Akane...
\n<Akane Minato>Well, you've been listening to my complaints too...

\n<Sonoda>Is that so? Even Akane has things to complain
about... Huh...
\n<Akane Minato>Hehe... Don't worry, it's not about you, Kohei-san.

Momo remained at Onomichi Productions alone and
utilized her natural skills to work in the
administrative department of the security
division. Fortunately, it seems that she has been
maintaining a close relationship with Akane.

\n<Akane Minato>Ah... By the way, did you watch the livestream the
other day?

\n<Sonoda>Ah, I watched it... It was the one where Kino came
out, right? I couldn't help but laugh when the
comments section was filled with 'I knew it' after
'I used to be a delinquent'.

\n<Akane Minato>Hehe, that's right. I was watching it on the train, so
it was really risky...

I feel bad for Kino, but the two of us were
laughing together.

\n<Sonoda>Nowadays, that person has become a respectable nyutuber.
You never know what life has in store...

\n<Akane Minato>Yes, that's true... but I'm a little worried because
it seems like I haven't been able to take a proper
day off for a long time...

It seems that Kino and I have been continuing to
interact, but our schedules haven't been aligning
lately, so we've been missing each other.
\n<Sonoda>You're working hard, huh...

I... haven't seen Kino at all. After the band
disbanded, we parted ways at the office and
haven't met since.

Through Akane, Momo and I had gone out for meals a few
times, but due to what happened that night, I had
become distant from Kino.

Akane takes my hand and steps onto the crosswalk. And
then, suddenly... my eyes are drawn to a man in a
motorcycle suit straddling a bike.

After the band disbanded, she took about a month of
rest and then made her debut as an actress.
However... it was not as the lead actress in that
movie, but as a minor role in a drama. In the end,
the movie never went into production and the
project itself fell through.

The truth was buried in darkness as I, at that time,
doubted whether everything was just that man's
fabrication. However, fearing retaliation and with
no one raising objections, the truth remained
hidden.

Regarding her actress debut, there were many criticisms and
doubts about her actions. However, that was only
temporary, and the public's interest in her
gradually faded...

And then, about half a year ago... without leaving
much of a mark as an actress, she suddenly
announced her retirement and left the
entertainment industry...

Occasionally... I hear her songs on TV, radio, video sites, and
such. And every time, I am filled with self-blame
and fall into a spiral of what if thoughts.

But... I must not stop this series of events. It's like
a punishment for me, something I must suffer for
the rest of my life... And always, at the end, I
find myself wishing for this.

I wonder... Is she able to smile now? Is she still
singing somewhere? If only... I hope she has
forgotten about me and is walking towards a happy
future.

It might be a selfish wish to lighten the burden of
my sins. Even so, I couldn't help but... I
couldn't help but make that wish.

\n<Sonoda>Sigh... The holiday is coming to an end... I want to keep
playing with Akane forever...
\n<Akane Minato>Hehe, you say that every week, don't you?

Thanks to the connections of my senior who took care of
me at Onomichi Pro, it was fortunate that I was
able to find another job immediately after being
discharged from the hospital.

It was a small advertising agency, and the
atmosphere within the company was good, making it
a friendly workplace. So I was able to fit in
quickly.

\n<Akane Minato>Since it's an important time for both of us, let's do
our best!

\n<Sonoda>Well, I'm just a new employee... but Akane, you're the
same, right?

After we started dating, I found out that Akane had a
hobby of creating children's picture books.

Akane seems to have a reddish tinge to her personality,
but I think it's quite a rock-like hobby for
someone who used to play drums in a rock band...
So, it seems she couldn't bring herself to mention
it because she was conscious of that.

And after I found a new job... as my life started to
settle down in various ways, Akane made up her
mind and decided to seriously pursue her dream of
becoming a professional children's book author.

\n<Sonoda>If there's anything I can help with, should I assist
you? As an assistant, my hidden power will
awaken...

\n<Akane Minato>Please utilize that confidence in your current
workplace...
\n<Sonoda>Well then, see you again on Friday...

I send Akane off and turn back towards the station,
but my sleeve is grabbed, stopping me in my
tracks.
\n<Akane Minato>Ah... I'm sorry... But today, um...
\n<Sonoda>(Ah, I see... Because we talked about us today...)

One of the unspoken rules that has somehow taken root
between us is... When we're alone together, not
mentioning her name.

After going through that summer training camp and
starting a relationship, the two of us felt that
it was somehow different to talk about her. It's a
rather heartless story, but we consciously avoided
bringing up the topic of her.

\n<Sonoda>(From the topic of the two of us, I associated it with
her, and from there, I probably associated it
with... that unwanted affair with that man...)

I don't want to remember either. When I suddenly
remember it when I'm alone, I'm made to taste the
feeling of a loser that makes me feel nauseous.

\n<Sonoda>Yeah... If I go home on the first train, I should make it
to work on time.

......Our relationship is by no means healthy. It's not
something to be proud of, nor is it something that
can be forgiven.

Even though I understand, it's no good. We... can't
live without each other anymore. Only a fellow
accomplice who knows the same pain can fill this
wound in our hearts...

\n<Akane Minato>Ah, it feels so good, Kohei-san. More... there... I
want you to fuck my pussy like crazy...

\n<Sonoda>Hehe, amazing... Akane's pussy is tightening and asking
for more, saying 'thrust harder'.
\n<Akane Minato>Hey... because... \I[12]

When we have sex while licking each other's wounds,
it's always like this. Akane becomes even more
disheveled than usual and greedily seeks me. I
also lust after Akane like that and end up
treating her roughly.

\n<Akane Minato>Even Kohei's \I[12] is so hard... ngh... We did it so
much the day before yesterday and yesterday, but
\I[12]...

\n<Sonoda>It's because the other person is Akane. Even though
she usually acts refined, her true nature is this
naughty.

Choose words that will excite each other and speak them.
If pleasure can be obtained from that, there will
be no hesitation or confusion. However, there is
just one point...

\n<Sonoda>Hey... Isn't it about time you turn on the lights? I can
hardly see Akane's face.
\n<Akane Minato>N-No... You're making such a messy face right now...

As you can see... I'm being refused to turn on the
lights. It seems like it's because last week, my
expression looked like a completely different
person and I was being naughty...

\n<Sonoda>(Hehe... You're so relaxed just because I hid the remote
control, huh? While you were taking a bath, I
managed to install it... that damn app!!)
\n<Sonoda>「Hey! A○exa light c'mon！」

\n<Aruka>I don't understand what you're saying. Okay in
Japanese.
\n<Akane Minato>Kohei...san?
\n<Sonoda>Turn on the A○exa light.

The app that humiliated me, I conveyed the main
points concisely. And then... with a robotic
voice, the lights turned on.
\n<Akane Minato>Huh... Wha-!?

Akane, completely immersed in pleasure, reveals a dewy
expression.
\n<Akane Minato>No... stop, ah... ah... yaaah...

Thrusting forcefully without asking for permission. The
rhythmic swaying of the well-shaped breasts below
is incredibly arousing.
\n<Sonoda>(Are you solving it again this time...)

Akane always... untied her beautifully arranged hair
before engaging in the act. This was another
unspoken rule, repeated up until now.

Does this indicate that he wants her to think of him
and only look at him? And... when Akane stops this
act, will one of her anxieties be resolved?

I don't really know the truth... so I decided to
wait. If I were to ask about this, she, being a
kind person, would worry about me and probably
stop this act.
\n<Sonoda>(But, Akane... I've long...)

The only hope that remained in the midst of despair.
If \# is by my side, I'm sure I'll be okay from
now on.

We will continue to live, repeating apologies and
regrets from now on. Embracing each other and
relying on each other, together we will face an
unseen future...
